text: Henry J. Mullin (1862–1937) was a Major League Baseball outfielder. He played for the 1884 Washington Nationals in the American Association and Boston Reds in the Union Association. He played in the New England League in 1885–1886. ==Sources== Category:1862 births Category:1937 deaths Category:19th-century baseball players Category:American people of Canadian descent Category:Baseball people from New Brunswick Category:Boston Blues players Category:Canadian emigrants to the United States Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Washington Nationals (AA) players Category:Boston Reds (UA) players Category:Major League Baseball players from Canada Category:Newburyport Clamdiggers players Category:Sportspeople from Saint John, New Brunswick
title: Henry Mullin
